app_subtitle: Professional weather forecasting for motorsport circuits worldwide
privacy_description: Your privacy is important to us. This app collects minimal data to provide weather forecasts for motorsport circuits.
privacy_point_1: Location data is used only for weather services
privacy_point_2: No personal information is stored or shared
privacy_point_4: You can disable location services anytime
terms_description: By using this app, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
terms_point_1: Weather data is provided for informational purposes only
terms_point_3: Use professional weather services for critical decisions
terms_point_4: Circuit information is subject to change
disclaimer_description: This weather forecasting app is designed for motorsport enthusiasts and provides weather information for racing circuits.
disclaimer_point_1: Weather data is sourced from reliable meteorological services
disclaimer_point_2: Forecasts are estimates and may vary from actual conditions
disclaimer_point_3: Always consult official race weather services for competition decisions
disclaimer_point_4: The app is not affiliated with F1, MotoGP, or IndyCar organizations
weather_sources_description: Our weather forecasts are powered by multiple reliable sources:
weather_source_1: Open-Meteo API for global weather data
support_description: Need help or have questions? We're here to assist you with any issues or feedback.
version_info:
Motorsport Weather App v1.0.0
Built with ❤️ for racing fans worldwide
